reviews.review: I liked it but the songs were NOT as good as the first frozen. & there was a weird scene with Christophe and Sphin that they could’ve kept..
Didnt think that it could compare to the first movie. But the messages that the frozen franchise sends is just so sweet and moving. Such a great movie!

It is a good story, and my family enjoyed the movie.  However, TOO MUCH SINGING.  Holy cow.  There for a while, we thought they were going to sing the whole movie.  It was a good movie, but they could have cut out a few songs.  Even our kids thought they sang too much.

your service sucks, no easy easy to exchange, your deduct money fore refunds. i asked your employee if i could get a refund on 1 of the 6 tickets i purchased a week early, i was tips that refunds deduct money due too service charges but credits don't, he instantly credited me for all my tickets without my authorization or knowledge, i asked for him to return back my 6 tickets if he can't do a credit for just 1 cause my 3 kids still want to see the movie badly and were waiting  weeks to go. Your idiot employee and system doesn't have a instant update you inform you're customers is something's changed so when i get to the theater everything seems ok, my QR code tickets don't alert them when i let the lady scam my phone, however when i astride to my seat, another family had just purchased the very same seats i took an hour to pick out a week earlier with with fresh paper tickets because your system didn't update to not only give me my credits back for my 6 purchased tickets, but it didn't tell me that my tickets were invalid now because is you're idiotic employee who credited 6 tickets without being told to credit 6 tickets. So you not only stole $36 dollars from me, but your made my family fun movies night into a living nightmare because we missed almost half the movie by being told to wait outside in thelobby while the theater employee figured everything out due to your screw up Fandango. I will never pay for your services again.

i can't tell You how the movie is because of you my family  missed vital information
Decent story, my 10 year olds loved it so that's all that matters.
Way overrated not as good as first one
Better than the first one! The songs are super catchy and it’s fun for kids and adults
was intense to see what happens snd the ehile family enjoyed.
My daughter liked it more than the first movie! I liked the story they went thru. The solo song with Christof was a bit much, not a fan of that song- it made him seem very needy.

I was never a fan of the first one (23 year old guy giving this review), but Frozen 2 was actually really good!  The music was great and Olaf had me laughing out loud throughout the movie. Kristoff’s song sounds a lot like it’d be a 1980’s power ballad by Chicago
